description: Conversion of two flats into single dwelling house; reinstatement of historical internal partitions at first and second floor; reinstatement  ceiling at second floor level and replacement of four non-original roof lights at second floor to two conservation roof lights.THIS IS A NEW APPLICATION SUBMITTED DUE TO I.T. ISSUES EXPERIENCED BY THE COUNCIL. COMMENTS SUBMITTED ON PREVIOUS APPLICATION/S CANNOT BE TAKEN INTO CONSIDERATION FOR CONSULTATION PURPOSES
decision_conditions: <p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">All new works, and works of making good to the retained fabric, whether internal or external, shall be finished to match the original work with regard to the methods used and to material, dimensions, composition, form, colour, finish and profile, and in the case of brickwork, facebond and pointing.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">REASON:&nbsp;&nbsp;To ensure that the special architectural and historic interest of this building is safeguarded and that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the Conservation Area.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">The new doors shall match exactly the materials, dimensions and profiles of existing original work, except where otherwise shown in the drawings hereby approved.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal; min-height: 15px;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">REASON: To ensure that the special interest of the Listed Building is preserved.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">Notwithstanding the details shown on the drawings hereby approved, detailed drawings showing the following modification(s) to the scheme must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work is commenced:<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">a) Method statement outlining the construction method of the reconstructed walls on the second floor<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">b)1:10 elevation and cross section of rooflights<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">c) 1:5 details of the new architraves<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">d)Details of internal mouldings<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal; min-height: 15px;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">This/these part/s of the development may only be undertaken in accordance with the modification(s) thus approved and retained thereafter.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal; min-height: 15px;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p><p style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-stretch: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;">REASON: To ensure that the special interest of the Listed Building is preserved.</span></p>
